scripts.build: apt-get update && apt-get install -y ffmpeg python3 python3-pip && pip3 install yt-dlp && npm install
scripts.install-yt-dlp: node install-yt-dlp.js || (echo 'Retrying yt-dlp installation...' && node install-yt-dlp.js)
scripts.postinstall: npm run install-yt-dlp || echo 'Warning: yt-dlp installation failed, but continuing build process'
